name: ext_R5_BiologicallyDerivedProductDispense
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.BiologicallyDerivedProductDispense for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents BiologicallyDerivedProductDispense from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/BiologicallyDerivedProductDispense|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: A record of dispensation of a biologically derived product
element.definition: This resource reflects an instance of a biologically derived product dispense. The supply or dispense of a biologically derived product from the supply organization or department (e.g. hospital transfusion laboratory) to the clinical team responsible for clinical application.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.definition: The amount of product in the dispense. Quantity will depend on the product being dispensed. Examples are: volume; cell count; concentration.
element.comment: The context of use may frequently define what kind of quantity this is and therefore what kind of units can be used. The context of use may also restrict the values for the comparator.

constraint.human: If a code for the unit is present, the system SHALL also be present
The comparator is not used on a SimpleQuantity
